name: Otok
description:
When you start the game gives you a 4x4 - 12x12 block island, and the colors of the Roofs, Water, Grass, and Trees, are randomly picked.

Then you are given a random building that you can rotate and place where you choose. After placing it, you will be given another building, to build a nice little pretty island.

Objects that are placable include:

Trees
Rocks (as of v1.03)
Buildings
Other Structures
The placable objects that are randomly given are dependent on the style of the island which is randomly picked between the current three styles.

Current Styles include:
- Medieval (castle-type stuff)
- Plain (modern-day normal-looking buildings)
- Adobe (pueblo architectural style)


The Game is solo developed, hopefully, you enjoy it, it's a very simple concept.

And this is my first game in actual 3D where I had to use Blender to model the buildings.
